auth.name: Full name
auth.registerSuccess: Account created. Please check your email to verify.
auth.verifyEmailSent: We sent a verification link to your email.
auth.checkEmailInstructions: Please check your inbox and click the verification link we sent you. The link will expire in 24 hours.
auth.verifyEmailCorrect: Make sure you entered the correct email address
auth.waitFewMinutes: Wait a few minutes and try again
auth.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your email address...
auth.emailVerifiedMessage: Your email has been verified. You can now log in to your account.
auth.verificationFailedInstructions: The verification link may have expired or is invalid. Please try registering again or contact support if the problem persists.
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.passwordResetEmailSentDescription: We've sent a password reset link to your email address.
auth.passwordResetEmailInstructions: Click the link in the email to reset your password. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.
auth.passwordResetEmailExpiry: The reset link will expire in 1 hour.
auth.passwordResetSuccessDescription: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
auth.resetTokenExpired: This reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.invalidResetTokenDescription: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.termsRequired: You must accept the Terms of Service to register

paymentMethods.acceptedMethods: We accept the following payment methods:

listing.videoRecommended: Recommended: Walkaround, cold start, driving footage, engine running
listing.noVideosUploaded: No videos uploaded yet. Videos are optional but highly recommended.
listing.addWalkaroundVideos: Add walkaround videos, cold starts, or driving footage to help buyers.
listing.videoTipWalkaround: Film a complete walkaround of the vehicle
listing.videoTipColdStart: Show cold start and engine running
listing.videoTipFeatures: Demonstrate any special features or issues
listing.videoTipCompress: Compress large videos before uploading if needed

cookie.title: Cookie Preferences

cookie.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how you use Finds

account.settingsDescription: Manage your account settings and privacy
account.myBidsDescription: View and track all your auction bids in one place
account.myListingsDescription: Manage your vehicle listings and submissions
account.watchlistPageDescription: Track auctions you're interested in and get notifications
account.sellerDashboardDescription: View your sales performance and analytics
account.noBidsDescription: You haven't placed any bids yet. Start bidding on auctions to see them here.
account.noWatchlistDescription: You haven't added any auctions to your watchlist yet. Browse auctions and click the heart icon to start watching.

users.banWarning: This action will disable the user's account and bidding. They will not be able to participate in auctions until unbanned.

auctions.noBidsDescription: This auction hasn't received any bids
auctions.invalidateConfirmDescription: You are about to invalidate a bid. This action cannot be undone.
auctions.invalidateWinningBidWarning: Warning: This is the current winning bid. The next highest valid bid will become the winner.
auctions.invalidateReasonPlaceholder: Enter a detailed reason for invalidating this bid (minimum 10 characters)...
auctions.invalidateWarning: Important: This action cannot be undone. The bidder will be notified and an audit log entry will be created.
auctions.viewBidHistoryDescription: View complete bid history and manage bids

sell.title: Submit Your Vehicle
sell.description: List your classic car, barn find, or project vehicle on Finds
sell.subtitle: Fill out the form below to submit your listing for review. Our team will review your submission within 1-2 business days.

sellCta.description: List it on Finds and reach thousands of enthusiasts across Europe.

dashboard.payoutHistoryDescription: View your payout transactions and status

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.description: Manage your account preferences and data
settings.emailReadOnly: Email cannot be changed. Contact support if you need to update it.
settings.name: Display Name
settings.countryHelp: Your country is shown anonymously when you bid on auctions.
settings.paymentMethodsDescription: Manage your cards for bidding and payments
settings.biddingEnabled: You can place bids on auctions
settings.biddingDisabled: Add a payment method to start bidding
settings.paymentSetupError: Failed to set up payment method
settings.removePaymentMethodDescription: This card will no longer be available for bidding or payments.
settings.removeLastPaymentMethodWarning: This is your only payment method. Removing it will disable your ability to bid on auctions.
settings.gdprDescription: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, export, and delete your personal data.
settings.exportDataDescription: Download a complete copy of all your personal data stored in our system, including your profile, bids, listings, and activity history.
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
settings.exportDialogDescription: We will compile all your personal data into a downloadable file. This includes:
settings.exportIncludesBids: All your bids and auction activity
settings.exportProcessingTime: Your data export will be ready within 48 hours. You'll receive an email when it's ready to download.
settings.deleteDialogWarning: WARNING: This will permanently delete your account!
settings.deleteRemovesProfile: Your profile and account will be permanently deleted
settings.deleteRemovesBids: All your bid history will be removed
settings.deleteRemovesListings: Your listings will be withdrawn and deleted
settings.deleteIrreversible: This action is irreversible - you cannot recover your account
settings.deleteGracePeriod: You have a 30-day grace period to cancel this request before permanent deletion occurs.
settings.exportRequestCreated: Data export request created successfully. You'll receive an email when ready.
settings.deleteRequestCreated: Account deletion request created. You have 30 days to cancel before permanent deletion.

recentSales.title: What's Selling in Europe
recentSales.subtitle: Recent auction results from Bring a Trailer, Catawiki, and more
recentSales.sellPrompt: Have a classic car like these? Reach thousands of collectors on Finds.

condition.title: Condition Assessment
condition.disclaimer: Condition assessments are provided by the seller. All vehicles are sold as-is. Please inspect carefully before bidding.
condition.gridIntro: Please assess the vehicle's condition across these 5 categories. Be thorough and honest - transparency builds buyer trust.

isRunning.label: Is the vehicle running?
isRunning.description: Can the vehicle be driven under its own power?

condition.nonRunningNotice: Non-running vehicles are welcome on Finds. Barn finds and project cars are a significant part of our community. Be sure to describe what is known about why the vehicle does not run.

knownIssues.label: Known Issues
knownIssues.placeholder: List all known issues, defects, or problems with the vehicle. Be thorough - this protects both you and the buyer.
knownIssues.hint: If there are no known issues, you can write 'No known issues'. However, for project cars and barn finds, there are usually multiple items to disclose.

categories.overallPlaceholder: Describe the vehicle's overall state. Consider age, mileage, maintenance history, and general presentation.
categories.paintBodyPlaceholder: Note any chips, scratches, dents, rust, repaints, or bodywork. Mention panel gaps and fit.
categories.interiorPlaceholder: Describe seats, carpets, dashboard, headliner, controls. Note wear, tears, stains, or modifications.
categories.framePlaceholder: Assess structural integrity, rust, previous repairs, subframe condition, and undercarriage protection.
categories.mechanicalPlaceholder: Cover engine performance, transmission, brakes, suspension, electrics. Note any recent service or issues.
